In conclusion If you feel like you identify with the student/worker/average person who needs a laptop for travel and general use, you can purchase this laptop knowing it will perform well for you. HP is a great brand and makes reliable computers. I would highly recommend this laptop for anyone who plans to use it for school.

reviews.name: Patrick Dalbec
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2019
reviews.title: Great Laptop for Price - first impression
reviews.review_text: I bought this laptop knowing it wouldn't be a powerhouse. This is a basic laptop that functions well for a great budget price. I bought this for the online classes I am taking and some light internet browsing, aka Pinterest, Facebook, etc. I wouldn't recommend it for gaming or for if you need any software like AutoCad, photo editing software or for work purposes. This is a great personal use computer and for school depending on your degree.  I immediately uninstalled the game pack that came with it. I wish you could uninstall the other bloatware that comes with it, unfortunately I am having a hard time finding it to uninstall. There are so many "trials" for games, dropbox, etc. that I don't want popping up all the time hence the 4 stars.

reviews.name: OregonCynthia
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2019
reviews.title: Nice laptop
reviews.review_text: I bought this in a rush when my Dell died suddenly.  I basically looked at price and the reviews.  I was interested in a home laptop to use for emails, surfing, and Office applications.  I'm very impressed with what I've seen so far.  Good battery life, nice size (14" seemed a lot smaller than my 17" Dell, but as noted in other reviews, the design of the keyboard gives me the same keyboard area as my Dell) and it's very lightweight.  No complaints at all.  For the money I think this is a very nice laptop.

reviews.name: Tofu
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2019
reviews.title: Good laptop, hasn't frozen yet, even with an i3 processor.
reviews.review_text: I bought this with on a tight budget. Even though I was kinda doubtful about it having an i3 processor, I am very satisfied with it. I'm currently using it in a nursing program, where I take exams online. It hasn't lagged or frozen during my exams, yet. Hopefully it'll stay like this for the next 2 years. I don't do anything else on it except for school related stuff, and it is runs good enough for my needs.

reviews.name: Random shopper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2019
reviews.title: Good simple computer, good value for the $$$
reviews.review_text: Some reviews compared to a Macbook, which is unfair. This computer costs 1/3 price and you should expect some trade offs for saving that $1000. I am using it only for internet access and simple word processing, spreadsheet tasks. Does those jobs admirably. It is a bit slow to start up and needs a nudge to connect "automatically" to my trusted wifi networks. But nothing a couple of seconds patience won't overcome.

reviews.name: MK
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2018
reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.review_text: I've only had this for a day, but it looks great in terms of speed and ease. Looks like a good laptop for the price. I will be using it basically for writing and browsing the internet. There was a lot of MS bloatware though, that I got rid of. Only thing, description says Ash Silver, I got Gold. Other than that- looks good. Seller: TechFamily.

reviews.name: Brandon Shurboff
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2019
reviews.title: Worked Great for a Month, UNTIL
reviews.review_text: I'm a college student without a whole lot of money, so I saved up for a while to afford this. It worked AMAZINGLY for a month, never ran slow, and had minimal problems. I had set it down at one point on a table, and the screen jostled due to how I put it down, causing it to take on the appearance of a glitchy checkerboard-- But it was fixed by turning it off and then back on. But I booted up my laptop today, and suddenly, there's a black blob on the screen. From VERY casual use, the screen has burned out, it appears. When not in use, I keep my laptop ontop of a plastic tote under my bed. It's never on the floor, it's never been dropped, it just lived under my bed until I needed it. Yes, the computer still works, but I can't believe that I have to deal with a giant blob on the bottom of my screen now! I would've bought the warranty, but I couldn't afford it.

reviews.name: N. Robles
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2019
reviews.title: Great until it died
reviews.review_text: Ordered August 16, 2019 for school. The computer was meeting my needs and working great until September 26, 2019. It would not turn on, then I plugged in and the charge light was on, but only momentarily, the light no longer indicates a charge, the battery is hot despite being charged. I tried several outlets, unplugging to let the battery cool, but nothing seems to be working. Just over 30 days and it's dead :( I have contacted seller through Amazon to see how we can fix the problem. I will say that before it stopped working, the screen was great, battery life was good lasting a day of use at school, keys were easy to use, and the speed of the operating system was sufficient for my needs as a law student. I hope there's a remedy for my laptop, I need it back asap.

reviews.name: Michelle Keshk
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2019
reviews.title: Great laptop for students
reviews.review_text: I'm a college student so I needed a laptop that was lightweight, portable, good battery life, and can run multiple programs at once (i.e. Excel, Word, Chrome). I've had this laptop for almost four months now and it has met all of my needs and then some! Battery lasts all day, laptop is extremely light, and I can easily run many programs at once. I got this to replace an older Mac Book Pro, and this is an upgrade in my opinion.

reviews.name: EnduringArts
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2020
reviews.title: False Advertising...
reviews.review_text: 1. I bought a Windows 10 machine, NOT a Windows 10S (Even though you can disable it with a bunch of loop jumping, it's still petty and sleazy for Microsoft to impose their BS Monopolizing) 2. I bought a machine with a 1TB HDD and 128BG SSD .....There is only a 128 SSD (when the drives are listed in system Information it only shows 1 drive with 128GB.) The product page where all the system specification are laid out it was clear and straight forward. what I got is not what I bought. One star...

reviews.name: Vincent P. Ackerman
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2019
reviews.title: Arrived damaged.
reviews.review_text: I didn't get to use it. I received it damaged. What ever it hit went through 2 boxes and an air gap of about an inch.  Still put a dent in the bottom of the computer 1/8" deep. Not happy about that. Plus nothing was done for me but putting the amount on a gift card. Because they were out of the computer I ordered. Locking me into buying from Amazon.  Even though I needed the computer asap. Not to happy about the whole ordeal.

reviews.name: Carsonsmom
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2018
reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: Just received today and so far I love it!  Super fast. Love that the keyboard doesn’t have the number keypad. Keys are large and easy to type on.  Screen is super clear

reviews.name: SL
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2019
reviews.title: Turn Off S Mode or Get a Pricier Machine
reviews.review_text: I am not going to lie, with decent SSD memory, 8 gigs of Ram and the i3 processors (not the high dollar i5 or i7), I am pretty happy with my less than $400 purchase.  If you are looking for a "Chromebook", this machine is a little deceiving at first.  It comes with Microsoft Windows 10 operating system in "S" mode.  If you want to keep it in "S mode" that's fine; however, I think that "S mode" simply makes it impossible to utilize Google and other apps on a device that has the capability to do more.  I turned it off on day two and I have been happy with my machine.  If you aren't willing to fart with Microsoft monopoly "s mode" crap, I would recommend buying a Chrome book for about $100 more.  I think this is a good machine with a lot of potential, but I also think "S mode" is stupid.  It isn't safety and security that they are marketing with "S-mode", it's creating division and preventing free market apps unless you turn it off or elect to change operating systems. I have owned this machine for less than two weeks and I like it.  I had to change mouse setting and play with that "S Mode"  stuff, but overall I am satisfied with my replacement computer after using the same machine for 10 years (MacBook Pro).  With a large family and a tight budget, I am happy with my purchase so far.

reviews.name: matt
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2019
reviews.title: Don't buy this garbage
reviews.review_text: Bought this arrived on time screen was pitch black brightness was 100% talked to Amazon agent sent me to hp not dealing with this crap got my money back don't buy hp laptops

reviews.name: Kyle S
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2019
reviews.title: Shipped with Broken Fan and Windows 10 S Mode
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this laptop, and initially I was excited to use it. Immediately upon opening the shipping box I noticed that it was labeled on the physical laptop that it ran windows 10 in S mode. What this means is that any function, download, or App that is not curated from the Microsoft Store will not run in the computer. One can turn off S mode pretty easily but it negatively impacts the speed and performance of the laptop. The specs that the laptop advertises are generated when using S mode, so when turning off S mode, the qualifications the laptop sold you on, can be incorrect. I do not want this feature, and my problem is that this feature was not displayed accurately or, well, even at all on this store page. Had it been mentioned and accurately advertised that this computer ran in S mode, I would not have purchased it. That by itself wouldn't have warranted a review, but this laptop at the time of me writing this, is less than 24 hours old and I'm being notified during the boot sequence that a broken fan (90B) is being detected and continued use of the laptop will result in possible system failure (it will break the system). The fact that this laptop shipped broken, with an obvious fan issue, pushes me to attempt to get a refund. I didn't want to spend time on this, I have enough already in my day but I can't waste money on faulty products and can't spend more to fix something that should have been 100% functional when it was shipped to me. This is probably an unusual event for these laptops, and honestly if it wasn't for the broken fan I would have been content, but again, can't throw money at things that should have worked on reception.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2019
reviews.title: For 400 dollars it will suffice.
reviews.review_text: A Very mediocre machine, you are paying 400 dollars for it. I bought it for my niece for school. No gaming, no advanced editing or engineering work. Streaming online, writting essays/ powerpoint, and watching movies is what this laptop will be good for. I understood this going in, so please don't expect a supercomputer. The people bashing this computer as slow? It's 400 dollars, what are you expecting? This is the Corolla of laptops, if you want a Porsche shell out 800 minimum.

reviews.name: marcus
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2019
reviews.title: Very solid so far
reviews.review_text: Ive had it for about a month. I was tryibg to find a decent laptop for around 400$ that i would be able to work off and stay mobile with. It does everything I need to run my buisness and has pretty good battary life. One thing I really like is how fast it boots up it comes on in seconds and loads programs fast. Browsing speed is really good too and im able to multitask without slowdowns. The screen is good but is subject to glare pretty easily at times. Touchpad is solid as well as the keyboard. Its not incredible in any department but if youre looking for something that can keep up with a fast paced lifestyle it works great. A solid laptop at a great price point. 7/10 in my book.

reviews.name: bwasow
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2019
reviews.title: Inadequate
reviews.review_text: I bought this computer after returning a cheaper HP laptop.  But this low end laptop is still to low for me to recommend it.  It appears to start up quickly, but it takes forever to be ready to display anything complicated (like a photo accompanying an email).  It basically is very dim-witted.  It responds slowly.  It drops entire web pages.  It does not reach the level of a sturdy simple computer, which is what I need.  The battery life is much better than my old Dell laptop, and it is light weight.  Those are the only reasons I ever carry this laptop.  For anything serious, I use my ancient Dell.

reviews.name: Kindle Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2019
reviews.title: Nice machine for the money
reviews.review_text: I guess it has been a while since I upgraded. I am very satisfied with the speed for simple PC usage (video streaming).  The system comes setup as Windows 10 S-Mode.  The S mode will not let you install software that is not microsoft approved. No problem, when you try to install software that is NOT microsoft approved. The message window will give you an option to know more about turning off the S Mode. Just click on that and it will take you to a window that will allow you to turn off the S mode, then you will have regular windows 10, and you can install whatever software you want. I was able to install my office 360 and it seems to work just fine, not slow. Some folks complained about the speed of this little guy, I don't see any speed problems. My other older (5 years) PC is an HP,  I have been and I still am happy with my Desktop.  So I bought this little HP laptop for very little $ and like my Desktop HP PC I had this laptop completely setup in my 1st day. Usually there are problem setting up wireless printers , scanners and other computers on the network. Not with this little laptop.

reviews.name: Diet Vernors
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2019
reviews.title: 2 defective items
reviews.review_text: First one had severe screen distortion. Replacement has just a black screen. Would not but this product again. Spent $50 to FedEx the 2nd laptop to the person that needed it immediately and 2nd one didn't work either. Going to buy a Mac book

reviews.name: Robert Cox
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2019
reviews.title: Perfectly Affordable Performance
reviews.review_text: Start up is wonderfully fast even with the large amount of easy-to-remove bloatware that came pre-installed. I’ve written several papers on this laptop now and haven’t had any problems. The machine performs exactly as I expected. If I had to pick one negative, it would be wishing that the keyboard were backlit and had a numeric keypad. But alas, I went for a more affordable model and am happier for the money I saved making that choice.

reviews.name: Lawrence
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2019
reviews.title: No more macs!
reviews.review_text: I’ve been an Apple user up until now. I use an HP at work and needed to replace my old MacBook. Instead of a $2000 computer, I decided to try something cheaper.. I was really nervous but it has paid off. I was pleasantly surprised by this hp laptop. It runs smoothly, it’s light, the battery lasts forever! I was easily able to download my adobe and drawing programs to it. So far no issues! It’s perfect for writing, engineer work and drawing / design programs. I’d recommend a case for the laptop, but other than that it’s 5/5!

reviews.name: JADE
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2019
reviews.title: Hated it.
reviews.review_text: first off.... the screen res is absolutely horrible.... second.....IT'S SO SLOW......I just wanted a computer to do basic things for work....multiple windows opened....Skype calls.....etc.....this computer can't do any of that....well, not the one I got atleast. It has froze up on me multiple times when I try to make a Skype call......& I know for a fact it's not my wifi. I never have issues when using my tablets...phones.....friends laptops...etc....just this one.... do not buy this laptop. I know the price may seem good to you....but just spend a bit more for better quality...

reviews.name: Cliente de Amazon
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2019
reviews.title: Bien por el precio
reviews.review_text: Buen desempeño por el precio. El ventilador hace un poco de ruido. El espacio del disco duro un poco limitado. Y no es adecuada para procesos de edición complejos. En general muy bien

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2019
reviews.title: Great value
reviews.review_text: I love the look, size and feel of my new HP. It is super fast with the solid state hard drive. It shipped fast and arrived un damaged. Would recommend for the price point and quality computer that you can throw in a bag and go.

reviews.name: Izzie
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2020
reviews.title: Do not buy!
reviews.review_text: Bought this for school about 5 months ago and I’m already having issues with it. The WiFi card crapped out or something where it doesn’t pick up any available networks. I’ve tried multiple things to fix it including update the driver, uninstalling , re-installing the driver but nothing has worked. I’ve spent so many hours through countless YouTube videos and forums. But I haven’t had any luck. The HP forums offer absolutely no useful information at all. This is just not worth the headaches. Invest in something better.

reviews.name: Estenio Castillo
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2019
reviews.title: Excellent Product for the Price
reviews.review_text: I bought this product for my wife and she is happy with the laptop.

reviews.name: Paul D. Lee
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2020
reviews.title: Description incorrect/deceiving
reviews.review_text: This laptop comes with Windows 10 in S Mode.  No where in the description does the seller even mention that.  Windows 10 in S Mode locks you down- have to use Edge, have to use Bing, can't install anything unless you get it from the Microsoft Store.  Very Unhappy!!!  I thought I was buying a real laptop not an imitation Chromebook.  Do not buy this unless you want to be very limited on it's use.  Spend a little more and get a REAL computer.

reviews.name: Jay P.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2020
reviews.title: So far so good!
reviews.review_text: Very nice laptop, surpassed my expectations in build quality and processor performance since I was upgrading from a 4th gen i3. It can handle web browsing, MS office and light casual gaming like Minecraft along with more demanding titles like gta iv with a breeze as far as I've seen. Size however is the same as my older 13' notebook. Only issue I've found is the left click button has gone really soft only after some light use which will require to open it up for repair.

reviews.name: Jacob L.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2019
reviews.title: Great College Laptop
reviews.review_text: Bought this laptop for a friend who goes to college. Upon using it for a couple weeks they said they liked it and it was super fast. They had no issues or hiccups since then. Laptop is great for simple work like homework browsing the web checking emails. I wouldn't recommend this laptop for any type of heavy gaming. All in all this laptop is great for everyday light use.

reviews.name: Amber
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2019
reviews.title: Runs like an HP... but where what happened to the buttons?
reviews.review_text: If you’re just looking for a simple laptop to send emails, go on social media, watch YouTube videos, etc. this one will do just that. Overall I don’t have any issues with it lagging. It’s easy to use and does what I need it to do. Good battery life. The screen is very clear and the sound is great too. I will say the keyboard letters did fade easily so I bought a cheap keyboard cover. I will also say the left click button is kind of loose and I’m not an aggressive clicker! For the most part I use the finger pad because it’s quicker when I’m browsing the web. So for the price I paid....I wouldn’t expect that to happen. The durability on that part could be better.

reviews.name: Robert C. Stoner
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2020
reviews.title: Great HP Lap top
reviews.review_text: This is a fabulous lap top, super light weight and thin.  I love the keyboard, I did not want one with the panel of numbers on the side, this is perfect.  I love the light weight, its slim and easy to pack.  It is a fast system, and I had no problem getting my previous computer info, transferred to this one.  It boots up quickly, and it is a wonderful computer, definitely recommend it.

reviews.name: Howard Chambers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2019
reviews.title: A GR8ET Computer for the price.......
reviews.review_text: This has all the bells and whistles of a $1000 laptop. I love the SSD which powers up and gets you going. The only annoying thing which I discover buying computers on Amazon is the need, in this case, to call HP customer support because the computer went to dark screen as soon as it booted up. The problem: In the eleven months this set on a shelf, it missed several software updates. Fifteen minutes later all was good. And HP extended the warranty one year because only 14 days remained on the original. Thank you, HP. If you can stand such inconveniences, a really great deal.

reviews.name: Alex C
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2019
reviews.title: Solid laptop for the money
reviews.review_text: Laptop does what is expected. Make sure to at least upgrade to the 8MB RAM, otherwise expect a slower processing. Otherwise this is a solid low prices machine. I use it for web surfing, word, excel, and powerpoint. Not sure I would expect more from it.

reviews.name: Carrie H
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2020
reviews.title: Reliable and problem-free so far
reviews.review_text: This was an emergency "work from home" purchase. It has been doing a wonderful job so far. The touch-screen is very responsive and helps me to be much more productive than I would be without it. Honestly, I switched from an old Macbook Pro (which, while old, was very reliable and performed extremely well) to this and had low expectations, but for work and streaming video meetings, it performs just as well as the Macbook. My transition to this machine felt seamless.

reviews.name: Theresa Desmond
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2020
reviews.title: Realtec wifi adaptor defective
reviews.review_text: It was working well for 25 dsys of use, and then it stopped being able to access internet.  I asked for self diagnostics to "fix" problem, and then my work stopped cold.  I called Amazon help desk. They responded promptly, I received a mailing label, and got my refund.  Voila! Happy with Amazon response to really "fix" this...;))

reviews.name: JonE
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2020
reviews.title: Happy so far
reviews.review_text: Bought this for daughter returning to school last Christmas. She is very happy with it and I have heard no complaints. I set it up for her in advance so all she had to do was switch on. As a Windows 7 user for ten years, I did need some adjustment time but soon realized 10 was a more sophisticated and versatile version of Windows. The laptop itself, is basic, not a lot of bells and whistles. Its construction does not feel solid, as thought it may break easily, but my daughter has a bad history with electronics, if she can't break it, no one can. We will see.

reviews.name: Sean Sullivan
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2020
reviews.title: Great laptop! Just turn off S-mode and you’re set!
reviews.review_text: Absolutely wonderful computer! Easy to set up! Works great! I bought this to replace another HP laptop. All I had to do with this laptop was turn off S-mode so I could install programs. This was super easy to do. I tried to install the Kaspersky anti virus that I have always used and a prompt came up to turn off S-mode, so I clicked the button, and it was as easy as that. I was able to download chrome and anything else I needed after that. The only reason I have a laptop is to do the schedule/check email for my job through the employee website. It does a great job for what I need it for. It takes about 5 seconds from when I press the power button until I’m scheduling employees from my employee website. I am thrilled with my purchase. Only thing is, this is not a touch screen, which I don’t really care about.

reviews.name: Jack Baglini
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2020
reviews.title: Warning!  Windows 10 in S Mode installed on this Laptop!
reviews.review_text: Completely annoyed the sellers description did not mention this laptop comes loaded with version Windows 10 in S Mode.  This nonsense version of Windows censors/restricts your downloads to ONLY those apps "approved" by the almighty Microsoft store.  It specifically EXCLUDES the ability to download or install Google Chrome as your browser.  You better be on-board with using Edge as your browser if you buy this.  Solution?  You must download MS Windows 10 PRO for $104 for the privilege of then being able to remove the restrictions on what you can or cannot install on your own PC.  What nonsense.  Had I known that in advance of ordering this, I would NOT have ordered this laptop as configured.

reviews.name: Wayne Crenwelge
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2019
reviews.title: Great upgrade.
reviews.review_text: I use this laptop as a platform that runs to a hub.  The hub operates two monitors, two printers, a backup external drive and a host of other items.  It's fast and efficient.  Plus if I want to unplug to take it with me, it is so portable.  Cool.

reviews.name: E. J.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2019
reviews.title: 14” Perfect Size
reviews.review_text: I went to a local retail store to see what size screen would fit my needs best. The 13” too small, 15.6” too big.  14” just right. Very light, great for travel. I’m a teacher and use it to do basic school work and internet functions. Set up was easy enough and thus far I’m very happy with the performance. Start up time is fairly quick, no complaints. Get a SSD drive instead of a spinning hard drive because you’ll get longer battery life. I’m a mouse person, so I got a wireless one and it works great.

reviews.name: Gus Dusted
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2019
reviews.title: Not what I expeccted or wanted
reviews.review_text: On-line description did not mention that the computer could only be used with Microsoft approved sites and aps. It did not have a DVD drive and could not be connected to network printer. This  computer may be just perfect for a student or younger user, it did not fill my needs. I could not give it a higher rating because of the limitations.

reviews.name: Brenda D.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2019
reviews.title: Just the right size for me
reviews.review_text: I have used this laptop as my main computer for several months. It was convenient to carry to the medical facilities, where I spent most of my time with my aged Mom for 3 months. I use it mostly plugged in, so really haven't tested the battery life. It came with a small crack in the left side frame, which has gradually become more prominent. I need to glue that down. Not sure it has anything to do with this laptop, but typing, etc. is a real learning curb for me, especially on Facebook posts. The cursor seems to fly away sometimes. Not sure if it's all laptops, but Microsoft frequently prevents Firefox from accessing their graphics hardware and the FB feed stalls and the next 3 post photos or images disappear from the screen. But, I am a HP fan and wouldn't trade this laptop for any other. It's also just the right size for my needs. I'm giving it 5 stars because I'm sure these grievances have more to do with Microsoft and my own learning curb.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2019
reviews.title: Very good
reviews.review_text: Light and fast even with the 3 level processor. It has a solid state drive that speeds it up, lengthens battery life and lightens it up. The touch pad is too large however and I am inadvertently selecting items I don’t want. Be careful to keep your palms off the touch pad when typing

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2020
reviews.title: I waited 2 months before I gave the review.
reviews.review_text: Bought this 2 months ago to replace a broken laptop. There is nothing I don't like about this laptop. I buy top speed internet and this computer runs fast for me. I am happy with my purchase. I would recommend this laptop. Great price too.

reviews.name: Peter Steimle
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2019
reviews.title: Great, but a Little Slow
reviews.review_text: Overall I am satisfied with my purchase. The audio is great in my opinion, and the laptop is sleek and a good weight and size. The screen is clear and bright as well. The battery life is also great; I have been using it on and off for a few days on a single charge. Since I needed a laptop for college, battery life was my priority. The only downside is that it does seem a tad bit slow consistently, especially if there are more than a few tabs open.

reviews.name: nicole
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2019
reviews.title: Great Laptop! 10/10 Recommend!!!
reviews.review_text: I did a lot of research before I decided to purchase this laptop, and I'm so glad I chose this one. I chose to do the setup and it was so easy. It works great, as I'm using it for school and I'm a college student. The battery life is great. The laptop is able to handle having a lot of tabs opened which again I need since I'm a college student. Very happy with my purchase and I definitely recommend this laptop.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2020
reviews.title: It's alright I guess
reviews.review_text: It's not a touchscreen. (Unless mine is defective) But I kind of like that better so my screen stays clean. I like how you can tell whether a caps lock is on or not by the light in the corner of caps lock button. It has really quite volume though. I have my college lecture all the way up in the video and the computer and I hear it at normal volume. Not loud at all. Too quiet if anything to be honest..

reviews.name: Paula Babbie
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2019
reviews.title: Quick & Simple
reviews.review_text: I bought this HP to upload and edit videos/ stream tv / and download music & it does all of that with ease. I'm impressed with how fast it runs. I've had zero problems with it so far. The screen quality is clear and vibrant. All functions work perfect. It's very simple to set up. You basically unbox it, set your preferences and it's ready to go! Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a reliable, fast laptop.

reviews.name: Randy
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2020
reviews.title: It can play games just a little glitches.
reviews.review_text: I bought one for myself for online college, and it's perfect for me. This in I bought vfor my wife for her courses as well, it's perfect for her. It runs office and the camera is good for simple video chats or webinars.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2020
reviews.title: DO NOT BUY A REFURB
reviews.review_text: Just buy the new one. I spent a total of 5 hours on the phone between Amazon's support like (they knew nothing), Microsoft (completely unhelpful) and HP (they knew a lot but couldn't fix the problem). Basically, the machine was convinced that the Windows software was illegitimate. It was a cascade of problems caused by how the software was downloaded onto the refurbished machine. I returned it and bought a new machine, and everything is working perfectly. Got it set up in 10 minutes. Do yourself a favor, and spend the few extra dollars.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2020
reviews.title: Fading Keys, No Touch Screen
reviews.review_text: No touch screen. Also, the labels on the keys are fading after just a few weeks and I haven't even used it that much.

reviews.name: Queen Bee
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2020
reviews.title: What a WASTE of MONEY
reviews.review_text: I wouldn't waste my money on this lap top for the following reasons. You don't have control over certain actions. It has Black Outs where it will just goes black then pops back up. It downloads whether you want them or not. NO TOUCH SCREEN. Had I saw that I wouldn't have purchase it. Its cheap very disappointed.

reviews.name: Charolina
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2019
reviews.title: Buy it!
reviews.review_text: Just what we needed it. We shopped around and decided on this one, and so happy we did. We travel a lot, that's we need a lightweight laptop. And this one has it all. Buy it!

reviews.name: Raza and Nadia
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2020
reviews.title: Crappy
reviews.review_text: Don’t waste your money on this laptop. Barely used it 4-5 times and the keyboard messed up. Contacted Amazon for help and they refused as the 30 day warranty was over.

reviews.name: ML
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2019
reviews.title: Great value!
reviews.review_text: Bought this for work; I need it for MS-Word, excel, and gmail. The keyboard is fantastic; great key action, not mushy like so many other laptop keyboards. Boots up super fast b/c of the SSD. Runs cool. It's very lightweight and thin. Battery life is average. I'm extremely pleased with this purchase.

reviews.name: Suzzette Cochran
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 29, 2020
reviews.title: Missing Numeric Keys
reviews.review_text: We didn't notice that this has no Numeric keys on the right. Therefore,  good for my husband...bad for me in my work. I'll have to buy my own laptop.

reviews.name: David Price
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2020
reviews.title: Terrible wireless connectivity
reviews.review_text: Fairly slow...worst part is the wifi...barely works in my house and can’t use with airplane WiFi at all...have tried multiple times and when the laptop doesn’t work on plane my phone still works great, so clearly a defective computer...no 5G either...

reviews.name: Karen
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2019
reviews.title: Worth the purchase
reviews.review_text: I had to purchase this laptop more out of haste because my previous laptop had complications, but I can say I'm actually quite happy with this one. It worked as expected for me and has a quick running speed for the applications I need as a university student. The smaller size makes it much lighter and easier to carry around in a smaller backpack, which is helpful when you have to walk around and switch to different parts of campus nearly every day. So far there hasn't been any major issues that would have made me give a lower rating, so sverall I'd say that the purchase was 100% worth it and I got the product as expected.

reviews.name: tania gheen
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2020
reviews.title: Good Value
reviews.review_text: I don’t think mine is touch screen, if it is I have not used it. The programming is weird, I can’t download Facebook Messenger and a few other things are very different to me, takes time to get used to, it is my very first laptop I have ever owned, I always said I wouldn’t own one. I do everything on my phone.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2020
reviews.title: Ok now. But needed work to make usefully
reviews.review_text: Seem to be a good computer. I purchased this to run a CNC , but had problems down loading the needed programs. After taking to to a computer knowledgeable person (which I am not) they determined it was because of the Windows 10S. No where in the description does it say 10S. Luckily he was Adele to remove the S and all seems to be working fine now. There needs to be Full Disclosure on items. Stop hiding the truth.

reviews.name: Sarah Dutton
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2020
reviews.title: HPs dont see or connect to hot spots!
reviews.review_text: Does not connect to hotspots!! After purchasing and not being able to connect to my hotspot, I did research. Big problem with HPs. Not sure why, can see and connect to wifi networks, but not hotspots. If you travel alot, or use hotspots for internet as we.do fornall our internet. This computer is garbage. HP also wont provide tech support for any hotspot issue. See you later HP! Never again.

reviews.name: Xavier
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2019
reviews.title: Great Laptop for basic things
reviews.review_text: I would recommend this laptop for any buyers just looking for a very basic laptop.  It is very quick to boot up so no wait time to get started on things like paying bills, surfing the net or checking emails.  This would be a great laptop for an older adult or student who just needs one for the essential things because it is a very easy-to-use system.  Also love the fact that is has so many port types (hdmi, SD Card Slot, 2 USB, and even an ethernet port for those every now and then moments) - no special adapters needed :)!!!

reviews.name: A t
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2020
reviews.title: Broke within four months. NO SELLER HELP
reviews.review_text: Advertised as a “1 year warranty” screen broke after four months and the seller said I needed to contact HP to fix the problem. Maybe they shouldn’t advertise the warranty if they will not help you when there is a problem.

reviews.name: Brian Durkin
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2018
reviews.title: Great laptop for the price!
reviews.review_text: I bought this laptop for my wife for basic needs.  She loves the size and weight of the laptop.  It performs well so far, no issues.

reviews.name: Gr8Mazon
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2019
reviews.title: Low end computer
reviews.review_text: This computer basically has Chromebook hardware with Windows installed. I used it to run a program and it stalled (not responding) in the middle of the job. The job didn't need much RAM. My other laptop worked fine.

reviews.name: Elena
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2019
reviews.title: Really great computer for school work
reviews.review_text: This computer is a lightweight computer. It runs very well. The keyboard is easy to type on. It does not have a VGA port and only has one HDMI port. Very happy with it. Came pre-installed with a bunch of software that took time to delete.

reviews.name: Sharon Maxwell
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2019
reviews.title: Good Computer
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my husband.  He really likes it.  Much faster than his old computer and it doesn't freeze like the old one did.  He is very pleased with it.

reviews.name: Leno M.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2020
reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.review_text: I bought this computer about a month ago, and so far it is working superb. The thing I don't like about it is how little hard drive space there is on it (128gb, and I am almost out :P ) but besides that it starts up quick, functions well, beautiful look, so far everything is working well. I am a college student (computer science) and I play the sims 4 in my free time, along with watch hulu, youtube, ect. I definitely recommend I think it is worth it (in store you are looking at computers about $500 for features such as touch screen and such but my brother disapproves them being a quality computer ie processor isn't too good)

reviews.name: D&S
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2019
reviews.title: So far GREAT COMPUTER!
reviews.review_text: Bought this laptop for work and so far I am very happy with it. Blown away with everything it does, especially for the price, even though the screen is a little too small but I am going to use a monitor to help with it. No complaints whatsoever so far. Will update review later on.

reviews.name: Adam
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2019
reviews.title: Nice machine for the price
reviews.review_text: Laptop is great for the purpose for which I purchased it. Starts up quickly. Battery life seems adequate so far. Don't set your expectations high on screen quality with this machine. Resolution makes a difference, so just keep this in mind when evaluating your options.  Overall, nice machine for the price.

reviews.name: Latrice
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2019
reviews.title: I love it !
reviews.review_text: My old Hp laptop went out and I'm a college student so I needed something right away .  This laptop came and it is so lightweight and sleek and feels so good. I love it, the design is good, the keyboard has a wonderful feel to it. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who needs a laptop in a pinch. This is such an upgrade from my previous laptop and I love it !!

reviews.name: Patrick Wilson
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2019
reviews.title: Solid laptop Great price
reviews.review_text: With the internal specs it's not going to run the latest greatest hard core software. That said, it's more than capable of running every day programs. My primary use is charting in thinkorswim and it has absolutely no problem doing that.

reviews.name: Yasmin
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2019
reviews.title: This isn’t windows, it’s windows S mode
reviews.review_text: I very specifically looked up the operating system for this device and in each category this page said it operated within “windows 10”. Turns out it runs on WINDOWS 10 S MODE. That means you cannot download anything not from the Microsoft store and I mean ANYTHING AT ALL. You can’t download chrome, or in my instance the entire reason I bought this laptop, for my online teaching applications. Now granted, you can switch out of S mode, but the fast speeds advertised using this system which is very misleading.

reviews.name: Gina
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2020
reviews.title: Quick little computer
reviews.review_text: Looked at so many computers  didn't realize it didn't have a 10key. But I really love how fast the computer moves. I can. Log in within seconds of waking up the computer.  I will always buy HP from now on. Oh it's really light too.

reviews.name: R. Montgomery
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2020
reviews.title: Simple
reviews.review_text: It was a gift for my cousin so not sure about the gaming. But, I was able to set it up for him and had no problems. I think he will like it and it will help him thru his college courses just fine :)

reviews.name: Ashley
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2020
reviews.title: Not good....
reviews.review_text: This laptop is rough.... I have an older version that is SO much faster than this laptop. To load a video takes over a minute. It freezes up all the time. Not impressed and I love HP products.

reviews.name: NANCY ALLEN
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2020
reviews.title: wonderful for home use
reviews.review_text: the product was bought six months ago,arrived early, setup was easy. The screen delivers great optics and unit is very fast ,can conduct my business without a hitch. For a home laptop I recommend this unit.Waited until I had some screen time to review.

reviews.name: Stephen
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2019
reviews.title: Great affordable starter laptop.
reviews.review_text: Great first laptop for my seven year old neice. Quick enough and very good looking. Battery life seems good for her for one day.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2019
reviews.title: Backlight
reviews.review_text: Screen backlight went out, and would not light up. Had to send it in to get fixed.

reviews.name: John
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2020
reviews.title: Son’s first laptop
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my son for his first laptop.  Uses it primarily for school, but of course Roblox is the game of choice for his laptop.  Screen resolution is not the best for videos, but sufficient for a first laptop.  Some keys have popped off and the mouse keys have sunken in.  I’m sure it is also my son being a little rough with the laptop.  Overall decent for what it was purchased for.

reviews.name: Fran Oh
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2019
reviews.title: Lasted 6 hours
reviews.review_text: It started working fine until later the same day, the battery stopped working.  I was not able to even delete all my personal data before returning the item.  I had to pay for the shipping for some reason UPS will not take it back for free of charge. This has been a loss on my part more than one way.

reviews.name: Gerald
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2020
reviews.title: Do your research first
reviews.review_text: Does not have a CD/DVD drive or a key pad, which I would have liked to have know before other than that it's not a bad laptop but I would not recommend this one.

reviews.name: Amy K.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2019
reviews.title: Tiny.
reviews.review_text: I knew a 14" laptop was going to be small, but dang. Wasn't prepared for how small the screen and the keyboard would be.

reviews.name: Shanley
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2019
reviews.title: Good value for my needs
reviews.review_text: Idk anything about laptops. This one stays at home, mostly plugged in, and I just surf the web with a million tabs open. Doesnt lack speed or anything, good for typical college papers n stuff

reviews.name: Elaine Honecker
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2020
reviews.title: Gets the job done
reviews.review_text: Great for business, fast startup but a lower storage because of SSD. Not ideal for heavy gaming but has the processor and ram to play moderate - low quality games. Had minor audio problems. Overall a good laptop.

reviews.name: TomW
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2019
reviews.title: Nice Notebook for Travel and Desk
reviews.review_text: Quick ship. Nice notebook. Hate Win10 and Apps, but use Win7 desktop and menu converter. Screen didn’t seem sharp, but appears to have self adjusted. Besides Win10, very happy. Follow-up after month of use.  No issues perfect for my travel and desktop need.  Processor fine, but needs more Ram.  Recommend buying.

reviews.name: Stacey
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2019
reviews.title: Didn’t work out of the box
reviews.review_text: Right of the box I had a windows error and couldn’t even get onto it the first prompt. I had to spend over an hour on the phone with tech support to totally factor reset the computer. A software issue.  It is currently resetting itself. I willbe returning if this didn’t fix it. I shouldn’t of even had to work on it fresh out of the box. Zero stars if I could.

reviews.name: Sandra Runge
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2020
reviews.title: don’t buy it
reviews.review_text: Bought this in December and didn’t start using it until the last couple of weeks with the isolation. It lasted about two weeks, and now just has a gray screen. needless to say it’s too late to return it😥

reviews.name: DolceSoprano
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2020
reviews.title: It works for what it is
reviews.review_text: I needed something for all my zoom meetings. It works fine for that. It's a decent little machine. The battery life isn't good at all. It will get me through though.

reviews.name: Virgi
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2020
reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
reviews.review_text: My son who has a Bachelors in Computer Science found it frustrating to set it up for remote because extraneous “stuff” kept popping up.  Note: his computers cost over $1000.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2019
reviews.title: seems to work well
reviews.review_text: I haven't had it long enough to really rate it. My last one only lasted one year. I will give a better review after one year with this one. So far it is about 3/4 as fast as it was when I got it.

reviews.name: Tracylain
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2019
reviews.title: Exactly what I needed. Amazing value.
reviews.review_text: Extremely happy. Hoping to buy 6 more for training

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2020
reviews.title: awesome laptop
reviews.review_text: this computer is everything I need for my at home, personal use. Very fast, keyboard is comfortable to use,. This is not the computer you want for gaming or heavy duty business, but for home use (e-mail, reading newspaper, web-surfing, personal banking, and of course playing candy crush) this computer is awesome. I can't speak for the battery life because I basically leave it plugged in at my desk. I would recommend this computer.

reviews.name: Kayla
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2019
reviews.title: Find something else!
reviews.review_text: This computer works well for internet browsing but we have had so many error messages where the computer randomly shuts down in the middle of school lessons. I would not purchase this product again. We haven’t downloaded anything and it has had many problems running the way it came!

reviews.name: John R
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2019
reviews.title: Quick and light weight
reviews.review_text: Bought this for a Christmas gift.  It arrived in 24 hours... geez fast!  Daughter loved the speed and how light it was.

reviews.name: Frequent Motion
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2019
reviews.title: Windows 10 in S Mode unlike the description says
reviews.review_text: EDIT looks like you can switch out of S mode. Will update after using laptop. Bought this specifically because the description says Windows 10. Not Windows 10 in S Mode. Received a laptop that has Windows 10 in S mode. Returning.

reviews.name: Avi Garel
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2019
reviews.title: Works well, fast, value
reviews.review_text: I used the computer once following set up. It seems to work well. I was looking for a specific system, combining a i3 processor, SSD drive (128 Go in this case) and 8Go of RAM. Set up was easy, all done using voice activated system. If the computer continues working as is, I will be very happy with my $404 purchase.

reviews.name: RICHARD
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2019
reviews.title: An excellent work tool.
reviews.review_text: Super fast boot up, good enough resolution and processing speed, but use for work, not gaming.

reviews.name: Gay Heiselman
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2019
reviews.title: High speed
reviews.review_text: Don't care for s mode can't do anything other than what Microsoft wants you to. Turned it off. Good speed. Just getting to know it at this time.

reviews.name: Natalie
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2020
reviews.title: Scam, missleading information
reviews.review_text: I'm disappointed with my purchase. It stated on their page a "8gb ram". When I received my package, the stickers on the box clearly say "4gb ram". And the seller wrote with ink "8" ontop of the "4" where it describes the product.

reviews.name: patrick
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2019
reviews.title: Broke after 9 months
reviews.review_text: Do not buy!!! Broke after 9 months and just wont turn on. Total waste of $400 bucks!

reviews.name: Bonnie Downing
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2020
reviews.title: Touchpad down!!
reviews.review_text: After only 5 months, the Touchpad as suddenly stopped working! Not only that, but it disappeared. Looking under Devices and Mouse, there is nothing to be found about the touchpad! Of course this happens now when my son, 8th grade, has ALL online schooling due to Covid-19. So frustrating and don't know how to fix it! We shouldn't have to pat for the repair either!

reviews.name: Doc. Artz
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2020
reviews.title: Great but does not have an internal drive to play DVDs or Blue rays
reviews.review_text: This is a great laptop however it does not have an internal drive to play DVDs or Blue rays. If one chooses to buy this laptop, Amazon has external DVDs or Blue ray player drives which plug into the USB ports. I do give Amazon support a star rating for helping me.

reviews.name: eric baker
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2019
reviews.title: Fast and reliable
reviews.review_text: SSD makes start up and work fast and easy.  Light, portable and functional.  Great laptop.

reviews.name: Elijah Daley
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2020
reviews.title: Buy! Buy!  Buy! Buy!
reviews.review_text: Amazing laptop at a amazing price! I’ve been using it for quite some time now and mostly for gaming.. it runs good and can handle multitasking very good!

reviews.name: Mimosa
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2020
reviews.title: Product Description needs more key details
reviews.review_text: It’s a good laptop but it only comes with a trial of Microsoft Office that will expire and then will ask you to buy a subscription. This was not clear to me in the description, so keep this in mind if you decide to get it.

reviews.name: Keri Bovell-White
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2019
reviews.title: Sleek
reviews.review_text: So far no problems, I thought it came with Microsoft office but it was just a trial. However I am happy with the laptop

reviews.name: james b potter
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2018
reviews.title: Fantastic Value for the Money
reviews.review_text: I had the smaller Acer Chromebook for several years and loved it. It survived a tumble down the stairs, an orange juice bath  and finally succumbed when I dropped it and then stepped on it while on vacation. I bought this laptop based on the performance of the smaller one. The speed is more than adequate and, unlike some computers, is intuitive to operate. This one has dual speakers on the top of the unit which I thought were lousy until I saw that they were covered with a protective plastic layer! For my listening these are more than adequate. The bigger screen is really a plus; when I do a lot of reading I don't have to strain my eyes and it will be more fun to watch a movie. I am amazed that this computer costs less than the smaller one I bought several years ago. Definitely a great buy!

reviews.name: Kyle Stroud
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2018
reviews.title: Better Sooner Than Later.....
reviews.review_text: 1st off - the laptop itself looks and feels great. The screen size is nice, it has a nice battery life and it boots/reboots quickly..... which I got to find out pretty early. The 1st time it froze up, it was for about 2 minutes. I figured I'd just go ahead and have less instances of Chrome open next time but to no avail. The 2nd time it froze up when I pulled up the Play Store, stayed frozen for 5 minutes and then reset. I could go on but I'm not going to describe every one of the 10+ instances it froze or the 6+ reboots. But what did it for me? I turned on the laptop, logged in & opened an instance of Chrome. Everything was fine. I took a shower and came back to a dark screen & thought it was just power saving. Nope. Hit the power button, logged in again, fired up Chrome & saw my buddy in the upper right-hand corner : "Chrome did not close correctly - Restore pages - Start Up Pages" (paraphrasing). WHAT?!?! The computer locked up while it wasn't even being used?!? That's enough for me! This bad boy is being returned on Monday. Oh, did I mention that all this happened within the first 72 hours of ownership? I'm surprised I was able to type this whole review without it locking up!

reviews.name: Florida Boy
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2018
reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT...SIMPLE TO USE
reviews.review_text: I was tired of Windows 10 faulty updates, and needed a reliable computer.  The Acer was recommended to me by several friends.  I got it last week and love it.  Easy to set up and understand, no heat from hard drive, quick, less hassle, nice quality, etc.  I still have my Dell with Windows 10, but for right now this Acer Chromebook is my first choice.  It takes a little while getting used to a keyboard with fewer keys, and more closely spaced together, but I have no other qualms about this Chromebook.  I am learning more about the Chromebook daily, and appreciate its simplicity and no need for added security.  Excellent value, and performance.  I was pleased with the Acer's price and features.  Easy to hook up to Ethernet with adapter if needed.

reviews.name: William Erario
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2018
reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this
reviews.review_text: Purchased this to replace our old chromebook.  For the price you can't beat this.  I am sure that there are other machines out there that are superior in certain aspects, but for what we use this for; schoolwork, minimal web surfing, some you tubing and emailing it is a perfect machine for the price.  Would highly recommend.

reviews.name: Stormy0440
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2018
reviews.title: Nifty laptop alternative for Gmail/Chrome use
reviews.review_text: I wanted a decent-sized laptop to use for traveling mainly for emails & some general Internet browsing as well. I went thru the variety of Windows 10 laptops & suddenly realized that Chromebook is a laptop as well, but more limited on what it can do compared to a Windows or Apple laptop. So I got this Acer Chromebook CB3-532 as my first Chromebook. Very nice looking laptop with a 15.6 inch screen, fairly easy to set up with a fairly good picture quality. It has a built-in webcam with mic, SD card reader, 1 USB 3.0 port & 1 USB 2.0 port plus HDMI port. It has 2 gigabytes of memory, 16 drive & headphone/speaker jack.  It does not however have a CD/DVD player/burner.  I attached an external mouse to use on this Chromebook....it works just fine. Laptop seems slightly sluggish but not a major issue for me....yet.  I have had this Acer Chromebook for a month now & still a learning curve as I have been using Windows laptops for over 12 years now......so indeed a big learning curve for me. It has wifi connectivity & you cannot hard wire into the Internet with this Chromebook, just by wifi....which is fine for me. There are no real icons on the desktop of Chromebook. Whatever I used on my Windows 7 laptop & had desktop icons....I simply will have to funnel it through Chrome browser already on this laptop. Battery life seems good at currently 7 hour life on a full charge and for the most part, this nifty Chromebook should do fine for me . 4 stars I give this interesting Chromebook mostly because it's a new thing for me to learn, but similar to my Android Smartphone....so not too bad, no desktop icons like a Android smartphone however. Needless to say, a learning experience for me with this Chromebook...keyboard a bit lacking features compared to a Windows/Apple keyboard. I may attach an external keyboard to see if the delete key works this way since the built-in keyboard does not have a delete key.

reviews.name: Barb cat
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2018
reviews.title: ... only had this for a couple days but I love it. I went from a macbook to this ...
reviews.review_text: I have only had this for a couple days but I love it.  I went from a macbook to this and expected to be disappointed.  I didn't have to adjust any of the settings or anything with this laptop.  I logged into my gmail and everything was perfect.  So far I have no complaints.  I can't believe how inexpensive it was.

reviews.name: caveat emptor
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2018
reviews.title: Works great for surfing the web
reviews.review_text: At this price level its bang for buck discussion.  The display has a bluish hue and I'm not sure if it's adjustable.  It's a little dark also.  I'll see if its adjustable, but it doesn't appear so.  Setup was a breeze, was surfing the internet within 3 minutes.  Battery charge seems to be excellent.  So, Bang for Buck, you cannot go wrong.  My demerits are on display qualities, but for under 200 dollars delivered, I have lowered expectations.  This replaces my MacBook air.

reviews.name: Qeuqeu68
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2018
reviews.title: It's okay...
reviews.review_text: Three stars because of the speakers being on top and not at the bottom of the laptop. Also because I function around Google so it's convenient to have a Chromebook. I didn't like that it doesn't have a right click function. It's an okay laptop, especially if you're just using it for simple stuff. I think I'll just spend a little more for more features.

reviews.name: Maia
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2018
reviews.title: Oh dear...
reviews.review_text: My father and I got this for my mom to replace her little Asus chromebook.  What a nightmare... First of all, it's big, it's pretty. But it's slow. Her pages weren't loading at all, and this is with sufficient internet. Everyone else in the house was blazing. She however, was not. I think this computer has a processing problem. Maybe the motherboard or the graphics card is crappy. But I don't know if this is a lemon, or a common problem. But I'd return it if it wasn't already past it's return date... Would not get again.

reviews.name: GaraLee C.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2018
reviews.title: 2018 chromebook
reviews.review_text: I bought this chromebook about 2 weeks ago, and so far, it is working really good. It doesn't come with a mouse, so if you want one, get it while you are getting this chromebook.  My son bought this same kind of chromebook from a nearby store. Because of his chromebook, I wanted one too. I'm glad I got it.

reviews.name: Kindle Customer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2018
reviews.title: The easiest computer I know.
reviews.review_text: This product is phenomenal. It is basic, easy to use and minimum password crazy. My husband has dementia and he can get on his gmail and other sites by himself. That saves me time and energy. I recommend this machine to anyone and everyone.

reviews.name: ono
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2018
reviews.title: worth a look
reviews.review_text: first chromebook- great for just surfing- i just don't like not having caps on the keyboard- hard for OF's to see

reviews.name: mark
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2019
reviews.title: Support Ends August 2021
reviews.review_text: I love Chromebooks, but recently found out that every one of them has an expiration date beyond which it will no longer be supported with updates.  That's understandable, but it is inexcusable that this date is not included in the product specs.  I bought this particular Chromebook for my dad in January 2019, and if I'd known about the expiration date being August 2021, I definitely would have chosen a different Chromebook.  Unfortunately, the only way to find out a Chromebook's Auto Update Expiration (AUE) is to check the Auto Update Policy page on the google support site, and even then they don't make it easy.  There are some Chromebooks on Amazon that I could not find on that list, so who knows when they expire.  Beware!!!

reviews.name: Michael Sebourn
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2018
reviews.title: I wish I had bought something something a little better.
reviews.review_text: I use this Chromebook for basic internet surfing.  Sadly it is the slowest new computer I've ever bought, which is super frustrating because I bought it to replace a slow Windows PC.  I wish I had returned it within the window to do so.  On the positive side, it looks good, has a nice big screen, and starts up quickly.

reviews.name: Barbara Staskelunas
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2018
reviews.title: Very slow computer.
reviews.review_text: I  had an Acer chromebook for a few years which I loved.  It was wonderful.  I bought a new  one and find that the sound is not loud enough to hear even turned to the highest setting.  What a disappointment.  Also it is slower than my former chromebook.

reviews.name: MAC 1313
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2018
reviews.title: Bought this at request for my grandson for his graduation ...
reviews.review_text: Bought this at request for my grandson for his graduation. He is extremely involved with gaming and was pumped to say the least when he received it. He was also appreciating everything else it could  do for him relevant to his continuing education. It was a Win Win!

reviews.name: Margaret Birney
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2018
reviews.title: don't buy this chromebook if you ever hope to print from it
reviews.review_text: The Acer Chromebook is fine for browsing or sending email, though somewhat slow. BUT forget printing from this, or apparently any other Chromebook. If you need verification of the problem, check out the postings on support/help sites dealing with printing from the Chromebook

reviews.name: cylv
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2019
reviews.title: No Tech can set it up
reviews.review_text: They hang up on me after saying "Oh I will call you back". This as soon as I provide my info, then serial #. There is NO call back every time or I am handed off, handed off and last will say "A call back". Nope. They also say "Oh, this is a Chromebook. As if something is wrong with that. The price paid was low. I am feeling it is not good so attempt to get me to buy another more expensive. Wasted time galor. Shows front page in English, then goes to Arabic, next Chinese-yes I am told to touch continue, then I will hear, Ah, I will call you back. Frustrated, weary

reviews.name: john houlihan
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2018
reviews.title: Just a disappointment
reviews.review_text: Something in the screen literally burst it and broke the screen so my daughter can't use it after a month of having it.

reviews.name: Janice H.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2018
reviews.title: Not worth the upgrade
reviews.review_text: The laptop is not an improvement from my old one.  It is heavy,  The keyboard is awkward due to placement of the speakers.  It is too light to the touch on pop-up items while typing.  I find it very frustrating to use and plan to get a replacement. The screen is nice and it has good battery life but it is slower loading than my old Chromebook.

reviews.name: I.M.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2019
reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
reviews.review_text: If I could rate this Laptop with a Zero rating I would. I Purchased this Laptop in January 2019.  Laptop stopped working last week. Computer lasted 5 months. While using computer, screen turned white with a large black spot appearing at the the bottom right of the screen.  Screen then turned black.  Discovered that computer was under a 1 year warranty from Acer.  Contacted Acer after instructions to Refresh Computer which did not solve the problem, informed by Acer Rep that I would have to send Laptop to their company for repair at my own cost.  UPS charges $49.00 to ship Laptop to Texas.  I refused to pay that amount of money.  Contacted Acer and informed them of UPS charges and that I would not be paying that amount of money to return the Laptop which was purchased New.  I was then told that since it was the first time that I was returning a computer they would send me a FedEx label so I would not have any out of pocket expenses. After sending the computer to their Repair Center by FedEx, I was informed that my computer has a cracked screen which is not covered under their warranty.  I requested that the Laptop be returned to me, I am not paying Acer extra money to fix the screen.  This Laptop was not dropped or fell at any time in the 5 months that I had it, it was not purchased as a Refurbished Computer.  I am now out $211 which is the price that I paid for it and it did not even last a year.

reviews.name: Jada G. Fish
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2019
reviews.title: Poor screen resolution
reviews.review_text: Great battery life, boots up quickly and is easy to use. My only complaint really is that the screen resolution is awful. Tried with and without glasses and the resolution always seems to be poor. It is super annoying to me and I wish I had returned it.

reviews.name: Jan Watson
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2019
reviews.title: It does what you want it to
reviews.review_text: This Chromebook is excellent.  The setup was easy, log into your gmail account and everything is there.  I already use Google docs and Google drive, so all of my files were immediately available.  My music is on Amazon, which is cloud based, so it too was accessible.  If you use cloud based software, you'll love this, no more Windows!  The item was in perfect condition, the price was outstanding, and it arrived quickly.  I couldn't ask for more.

reviews.name: MLC
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2018
reviews.title: Chromebook
reviews.review_text: I'm a teacher and it's all about Google Classroom. All of the students and staff were issued the smaller chromebooks. They've seen a lot of use and the mouse pad and keys aren't working well, so I purchased this larger Acer Chromebook. I'm glad I did. It's easier on my eyes and everything works well.

reviews.name: Genevra Gallo
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2019
reviews.title: Not as good as the Acer 13
reviews.review_text: I got an Acer 13 about two years ago and was looking to replace it with something newer. Unfortunately, I'm finding the 15 much less functional in several aspects. - First, the keyboard seems smaller than the 13. The keypads stick more and overall ease of typing is reduced. - Second, the screen quality seems to be worse. Although it boasts better graphics (and may actually have them), print ends up looking more pixelated on this machine. - Finally, the buikier size is not worth the larger screen. The Acer 13 is lighter and more easily fits into an over-the-shoulder bag. It's more useful for client meetings, and feels lighter on the lap as well. Overall, I'd go with the Acer 13 over this model if you're considering both - unless you're going to use the system primarily for gaming or video/movie watching--in which case the visual graphics and better speakers might be worth it.

reviews.name: samuel s.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2019
reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
reviews.review_text: I am happy with this "new version" of the Acer Chromebook.  It is exactly the same unit outside for sure and I cannot distinguish any internal differences either from the Chromebook I replaced that had been purchased refurbished over two years ago.  Not saying I dont like this unit because I do but I can tell no difference whatsoever in operating or internet speed let along startup speed.  The blue tooth function is always cutting out and the wi-fi is unchanged so dont get that.  It is still the best bargain out there for people like me who mainly to banking...email correspondence...and get their news off the net.  I will buy another one when this one deteriorates but dont expect any difference from previous years models.

reviews.name: Natalie R.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2019
reviews.title: PIECE OF JUNK!!!! DON'T WASTE YOUR $$$.
reviews.review_text: PIECE OF JUNK!!!! DON'T WASTE YOUR $$$. It bears repeating. I've had this overpriced paperweight for less than 5 months. I don't use it very often and tonight went to turn it on and it displayed a message that the Chrome OS is not working. I spent roughly hour researching and troubleshooting on the Goggle 'help' site and found out that basically there's no known fix if after attempting to download and install a new copy of the OS doesn't work.

reviews.name: hannah
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2019
reviews.title: The worst laptop I've ever used
reviews.review_text: I hate this laptop with every fiber of my being. The screen quality is weird and lacks clarity. I'm assuming the lack of brightness is supposed to be easier on your eyes, when in reality my eyes are straining. The mousepad is incredibly unresponsive and finicky, one moment doing nothing, the next moment I've somehow zoomed in. There's an ill-placed search key where caps lock should be, so that's fun to bump and suddenly derail my entire essay. You can't resize icons. I can't for the life of me save anything to my desktop, only pin it to the shelf. I'm not sure if I can return this waste of money, but lord I'm going to try.

reviews.name: lucky1
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2018
reviews.title: Excellent Computer
reviews.review_text: I appreciate the quality for the money of Chromebooks.  My children use them at school for assignments, it is very easy for them to pick up what they started at school at home.  The quality of this Acer product is superb.

reviews.name: msgator
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2019
reviews.title: Super fast and easy to use.
reviews.review_text: Why I took so long to get a chromebook is beyond me. The best purchase I ever made. It takes minutes to set up. Runs so fast, and is easy to use. I love the fact that there are not a bunch of programs already on the computer. I use my computer for personal home use: paying bills, watching movies, surfing the web, checking email. The battery life is INCREDIBLE!  if you want an every day computer that is easy to use and boots up quickly, this is for you.

reviews.name: TJ23
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2018
reviews.title: Good for the price
reviews.review_text: The screen resolution is not ideal, and the touch pad can be just a little wonky, but over all I love it and use it often. For the price, a great deal.

reviews.name: R. A. Achterhof
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2020
reviews.title: Perfect for "just internet" user
reviews.review_text: My hubby loves to go to his 5-6 sites for games and news but does not do any typing, very little emailing, and certainly no file work with his computer, so when the fan on his jumbo hard drive started to make frequent sounds of impending doom, I looked for a computer he could use with as little frustration as possible.... this  Chromebook does the trick!  It was easy for me to set up; I put all of his favorite game sites on the browser "favorites tool bar" along with his AOL email (yup, he uses AOL!  (:  )  and he is happy as a bug in a rug.

reviews.name: Jacob Herring
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2019
reviews.title: Great value
reviews.review_text: Loved the price. Battery life is very good. Also charges very quickly. It does everything I needed, I basically just wanted a web browser bigger than my phone with a physical keyboard. Using the chromeOS takes some getting used to but it’s simple really. It is lightweight. The screen and speakers seem like where they built to a price point. The colors of the screen are not vibrant and it definitely helps me see why Apple is so fond of their Retina display. The speakers sound tinny, no bass at all. Still, great value.

reviews.name: katty Dennis
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2019
reviews.title: funtion
reviews.review_text: So i bought this item in October of 2018 for my 13 year old  daughter who"s birthday is on the 25th December ... she was excited and  enjoying the use of this product.  Then exactly 3months later  it stop working , it is not powering up and i'm so upset wondering if i spent my monies in vein....any way i ordered a new charger for it and i'm awaiting its delivery to see if the problem is the charger why it wont power up.

reviews.name: beth giersz
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2018
reviews.title: Its dirty, sticky and apps don't work.
reviews.review_text: Well, it was covered in grime and there was sticky residue all over the screen, straight out of the box. It turned on very fast which is nice, but for some reason when I download apps, they dont work. I have to go to the main websites. Which would be fine if this wasn't a chromebook.....the apps should work. I just got it today, So, I can't say much more other than first impression.

reviews.name: James L. Murray
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2018
reviews.title: Overall impression
reviews.review_text: I am very pleased with this chromebook. It was at a very good priced with plenty of good features, and a larger screen than most others. I love the very fast shipping too. That is the very reason I keep an Amazon Prime account.
